a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Urban area over the long-term, 10,000 BCE to 2023
Estimated urban area by region or country, measured in square kilometers (kmÂ²) is calculated by dividing the total
urban population of a country in a given year by the average urban densities in that country during the same year.
